channel.title: Security+ on ZySec
channel.description: Recent content in Security+ on ZySec

item.title: Security+ Certified
item.author: thenytfury@zysec.space (Mohammed Zanil)
item.description: I am very grateful and happy to share that I have successfully completed my CompTIA Security+ certification. It was indeed a remarkable experience to learn about different threats, tools and technologies that are used in the enterprise to defend against the bad guys from breaking in. I would suggest this certification to anyone who is interested in pursuing a career in the InfoSec industry as it gives you a wider perspective and delves deep on certain technical topics.
